root: ^Ksenia, how do you know ancient Greek mythology so well?

c-0: ^Ksenia, how do you know ancient Greek mythology so well?
^This is a hobby, I’m interested in everything related to Ancient Greece.
^Your hobby helped solve the riddle of Apata. But now you are convinced that it is very dangerous here. You better get back to the hotel. I will serve as a guide.
^Well, I do not. My knowledge of mythology can come in handy, but you yourself said that I was useful.
^As you wish. But you can still change your mind.
^As you wish. But you can still change your mind.
